NodeXYZ

NodeXYZ

The main class of xyz-core. Most of the functions that the user should work with live inside this class.

Constructor

new NodeXYZ()

Source:
  • xyz.js, line 14

Methods

call()

Source:
  • xyz.js, line 130

call a service uses the default /call route opt is an object with keys like :

  • servicePath: {String}
  • sendStrategy: {function}
  • payload: {Object|Number|Boolean}
  • route
  • destPort

inspect()

Source:
  • xyz.js, line 65

Extents the default console.log method

inspectJSON()

Source:
  • xyz.js, line 86

returns the info printed by inspect in JSON format

middlewares()

Source:
  • xyz.js, line 151

Return an object of all middleware handlers available in the system. Each can be modified while bootstraping or at runtime. See Middleware section for more details.

register(servicePath, fn)

Source:
  • xyz.js, line 116

Register a new function to be exported.

Parameters:
Name Type Description
servicePath String

Unique path for this service.
fn function

Handler function for this service

terminate()

Source:
  • xyz.js, line 107

Stop XYZ system. will stop all ping and communication requests. Should onle be used with tests.
